tier.item: (5) Hans sagt, daß er gerade ein Buch liest.
Hans say-3s that he now a book read-3s
`Hans says that he is reading a book now.'
(5) Hans sagt, daß er gerade ein Buch liest.
Hans say-3s that he now a book read-3s
`Hans says that he is reading a book now.'
Hans sagt, daß er gerade ein Buch liest.
Hans say-3s that he now a book read-3s
Hans says that he is reading a book now.
Hans is reading a book now.
Now Hans is reading a book.
